snippet.title: Cyber Hook PC Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Speed through a gorgeous retrowave world using parkour skills and a grappling hook to scale and ride walls in this fast-paced, 3D platformer. Blast enemies, manipulate time and abuse physics to avoid falling to your death!


Purchase today on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1130410/Cyber_Hook/

#Synthwave #indiegame #CyberHook 

Follow us on Social Media for updates!

Website- http://www.graffitigames.com/
Twitter- https://twitter.com/Graffiti_Games
Facebook- https://www.facebook.com/GraffitiGamesPublishing/
https://www.instagram.com/graffiti_games/
